title: $675+ R/T Asia Sale on Delta
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $675+ R/T Asia Sale on Delta $675+ R/T Asia Sale on Delta July 1, 2015 3:07pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Fights to a couple of the largest, most-popular cities in China are on sale with Delta right now. Deeply discounted travel from many cities throughout the U.S. (Atlanta, Boston, L.A., NYC, more) to Beijing and Shanghai starts at $675 round-trip. Tickets must be booked by July 9; and departure flights must take place during September 22 - October 1 while return flights must happen between October 3 - 14. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
